languages.text: {n}Большинство рун лишены какого-либо смысла, но вам удается заметить среди них некоторые, складывающиеся в формулы и вычислительные графики. Авель пытливо взирает на вас, затем переводит взгляд на вид-скрин, и вы готовы поклясться, что под респираторным аугментом его лицо озаряет улыбка.{/n}

{n}Most of the runes are devoid of any meaning, but you notice a few among them that combine into formulae and computational graphs. Abel peers at you inquisitively then shifts his gaze to the vid-screen, and you could swear that a smile lights up his face under his respiratory augmetic.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Большинство рун лишены какого-либо смысла, но вам удается заметить среди них некоторые, складывающиеся в формулы и вычислительные графики. Авель пытливо взирает на вас, затем переводит взгляд на вид-скрин, и вы готовы поклясться, что под респираторным аугментом его лицо озаряет улыбка.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Most runes are devoid of any meaning, but you notice a few among them that combine into formulae and computational graphs. Abel peers at you inquisitively, then shifts his gaze to the vid-screen, and you could swear that a smile lights up his face under his respiratory augmetic.{/n}

{n}Most of the runes are devoid of any meaning, but you notice a few among them that combine into formulae and computational graphs. Abel peers at you inquisitively then shifts his gaze to the vid-screen, and you could swear that a smile lights up his face under his respiratory augmetic.{/n}

languages.text: {n}多くのルーンには全く意味がないが、あなたはその中の数少ないくつかが式と計算グラフに統合すると気づいた。アベルは物見高い様子であなたをじっと見てから視線をスクリーンに移す。そしてあなたは、呼吸器のオーグメティックの下で彼が笑っていることを確信する。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Most of the runes are devoid of any meaning, but you notice a few among them that combine into formulae and computational graphs. Abel peers at you inquisitively then shifts his gaze to the vid-screen, and you could swear that a smile lights up his face under his respiratory augmetic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}多くのルーンには全く意味がないが、あなたはその中の数少ないくつかが式と計算グラフに統合すると気づいた。アベルは物見高い様子であなたをじっと見てから視線をスクリーンに移す。そしてあなたは、呼吸器のオーグメティックの下で彼が笑っていることを確信する。{/n}

languages.text: {n}绝大多数文字没有任何意义，但你注意到，其中一部分文字可以组合成公式与计算图例。亚伯好奇地看着你，随后将目光转向了视讯屏幕。之后你清楚地看到，在他的呼吸器植入物之下，他的脸上露出了笑容。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Most of the runes are devoid of any meaning, but you notice a few among them that combine into formulae and computational graphs. Abel peers at you inquisitively then shifts his gaze to the vid-screen, and you could swear that a smile lights up his face under his respiratory augmetic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}绝大多数文字没有任何意义，但你注意到，其中一部分文字可以组合成公式与计算图例。亚伯好奇地看着你，随后将目光转向了视讯屏幕。之后你清楚地看到，在他的呼吸器植入物之下，他的脸上露出了笑容。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die meisten Runen tragen keine Bedeutung, aber du bemerkst doch einige, die sich zu Formeln und Computerdiagrammen zusammenfügen. Abel sieht dir interessiert zu, widmet sich dann aber doch wieder dem Vid-Bildschirm, und du könntest schwören, dass du unter seiner Atemaugmentation ein Lächeln hast aufblitzen sehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Most of the runes are devoid of any meaning, but you notice a few among them that combine into formulae and computational graphs. Abel peers at you inquisitively then shifts his gaze to the vid-screen, and you could swear that a smile lights up his face under his respiratory augmetic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die meisten Runen tragen keine Bedeutung, aber du bemerkst doch einige, die sich zu Formeln und Computerdiagrammen zusammenfügen. Abel sieht dir interessiert zu, widmet sich dann aber doch wieder dem Vid-Bildschirm, und du könntest schwören, dass du unter seiner Atemaugmentation ein Lächeln hast aufblitzen sehen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Si la plupart des runes sont vides de sens, vous en remarquez quelques-unes qui se combinent pour générer des formules et des graphiques informatiques. Abel vous adresse un regard curieux avant de se concentrer à nouveau sur l'écran, et vous jureriez qu'un sourire éclaire ses traits masqués par son augmétique respiratoire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Most of the runes are devoid of any meaning, but you notice a few among them that combine into formulae and computational graphs. Abel peers at you inquisitively then shifts his gaze to the vid-screen, and you could swear that a smile lights up his face under his respiratory augmetic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Si la plupart des runes sont vides de sens, vous en remarquez quelques-unes qui se combinent pour générer des formules et des graphiques informatiques. Abel vous adresse un regard curieux avant de se concentrer à nouveau sur l'écran, et vous jureriez qu'un sourire éclaire ses traits masqués par son augmétique respiratoire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La mayoría de las runas carecen de significado, pero entre ellas adviertes algunas que se combinan en fórmulas y gráficos computacionales. Abel te observa inquisitivamente, luego desvía la mirada hacia la videopantalla; jurarías que su rostro se ha iluminado con una sonrisa bajo su respirador aumético .{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Most of the runes are devoid of any meaning, but you notice a few among them that combine into formulae and computational graphs. Abel peers at you inquisitively then shifts his gaze to the vid-screen, and you could swear that a smile lights up his face under his respiratory augmetic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La mayoría de las runas carecen de significado, pero entre ellas adviertes algunas que se combinan en fórmulas y gráficos computacionales. Abel te observa inquisitivamente, luego desvía la mirada hacia la videopantalla; jurarías que su rostro se ha iluminado con una sonrisa bajo su respirador aumético .{/n}

languages.text: {n}Rünlerin büyük çoğunluğu herhangi bir anlam ihtiva etmese de aralarından birkaç tanesinin birleşip formüllere ve işlemsel grafiklere dönüştüğünü fark ediyorsun. Abel sana merakla bakıyor, ardından bakışlarını video ekranına çeviriyor. Solunum ogmetiğinin altında gülümsediğine yemin edebilirsin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Most of the runes are devoid of any meaning, but you notice a few among them that combine into formulae and computational graphs. Abel peers at you inquisitively then shifts his gaze to the vid-screen, and you could swear that a smile lights up his face under his respiratory augmetic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Rünlerin büyük çoğunluğu herhangi bir anlam ihtiva etmiyor ancak aralarında birkaç tanesinin birleşip formüllere ve işlemsel grafiklere dönüştüğünü fark ediyorsun. Abel sana merakla bakıyor, ardından bakışlarını video ekranına çeviriyor. Solunum ogmetiğinin altında bir gülümseme oluştuğuna yemin edebilirsin.{/n}
